priority: promptly to every citizen of the state is our priority.
chief_minister: Hon. Chief Minister Shri Bhupendra Patel
follow_steps: Follow these simple steps to find and apply for the right schemes for you.
search_description: Our powerful search engine will help you find the most relevant schemes.
enter_details_description: Provide your basic information to get personalized results.
select_apply_description: Choose the best suited scheme and apply seamlessly.
bharat_schemes_portal: The "Bharat Schemes" portal is a user-friendly digital platform providing primary information about various government public welfare schemes on a single digital platform.
easy_access_info: It aims to make it easy and convenient for citizens to access information about the government benefits available to them.
video_not_supported: Your browser does not support the video tag.
sector_description: Discover the right scheme based on your needs and eligibility within each sector.
